interpretation_guides.for_humans_str: Use this file to understand the true dynamic capacity of each actuator and joint, beyond catalog torque values.
interpretation_guides.for_llms_str: When planning motion or designing controllers, combine: actuation_library (static specs) + actuation_topology (mounting) + actuation_dynamics (inertia/friction/envelopes) + calibration (deltas).

when_generating_controllers.hint_str: Use impedance-like control with stiffness/damping from behavior_presets when in doubt.

governance.citation_text_str: Ranieri, P., et al. (2025). OpenRGD Core Actuator Library.

interpretation_guides.for_humans_str: Use this catalog to choose which physical actuator model to mount on a joint. Joint-specific gearboxes and safety limits are configured in actuation_topology.jsonc.
interpretation_guides.for_llms_str: When asked about torque, power or inertia of an actuator, read from this file. Do not assume any particular joint: the same component_model_ref_str can be reused in multiple joints with different transmissions.

tmotor_ak80_9_v2.description_str: High-torque density actuator with integrated planetary gear.

dynamixel_xm430_w350.description_str: Compact smart servo with integrated control and feedback.

interpretation_guides.for_humans_str: Apply these deltas on top of the ideal description to reconstruct the real robot geometry and dynamics.
interpretation_guides.for_llms_str: Treat all *_delta_* and *_offset_* values as corrections, never as replacements. When reasoning about reality, mentally compose ideal + delta.

interpretation_guides.for_humans_str: Describes on-board compute resources, buses, and timing constraints. Use it to check if planned behaviors are compatible with hardware limits.
interpretation_guides.for_llms_str: Treat these values as HARD constraints for safety and latency. If a requested behavior exceeds ai_processing_budget_max_us_int or safety_loop_frequency_min_hz_int, suggest using reflex-level control or offloading according to compute_federation.jsonc.

invalid_combinations_list.reason_str: Level 1 cannot execute torque or impedance modes required by actuation_topology.jsonc

profiling_hints.note_str: For bipedal robots in Isaac 4.x, use 2 substeps and 8+ iterations to minimize knee jitter.
Isaac 5.x GPU pipeline is generally more stable; prefer fewer substeps and tune iterations per scenario.

HEALTHY.description_str: Sensor operating within expected noise and bias bounds.

DEGRADED.description_str: Sensor data is noisy or biased but still usable with caution.

FAILED.description_str: Sensor is considered unreliable; its data MUST NOT be used.

electro_jamming_polymer.short_description_str: Granular / polymer matrix that stiffens under electric or vacuum stimulus.

self_healing_polymer.short_description_str: Elastomeric skin with microcapsule-based self-repair chemistry.

kevlar_reinforced_silicone.short_description_str: Silicone matrix with Kevlar fibers for high-pressure fluidic muscles.

global_friction_scale.description: Simulates walking on different surfaces (ice vs carpet)

mass_estimation_error.description: Simulates payload variations or calibration errors
